content: Based on the tender brief, the main purpose and agenda for this art installation is to promote the idea of togetherness and unity among the Chinese Singaporean community, particularly among youths and young families. The art installation is intended to be a platform for visitors to engage with Chinese culture and heritage, as well as to increase awareness of the Singapore Chinese Cultural Centre (SCCC). Additionally, the art installation should be attractive and engaging to the public, while incorporating a digital or phygital element.
